WorkItem.Description:
I have a regular xlsx file (created by Excel 2007), that I use as a template. I load it using reader, fill in data and save to php://output. 
 
When I insert an image (image.jpg in this particular case) into my template xlsx file, PHPExcel fails on line 87 in ZipStreamWrapper.php ($url = @parse_url($path)) with error "parse_url(zip:///usr/some/more/paths/my_template.xlsx#xl/media/image1.jpeg) [function.parse-url]: Unable to parse URL". 
 
According to php manual 
http://php.net/manual/en/function.parse-url.php
Note: This function is intended specifically for the purpose of parsing URLs and not URIs. However, to comply with PHP's backwards compatibility requirements it makes an exception for the file:// scheme where triple slashes (file:///...) are allowed. For any other scheme this is invalid.
WorkItem.Summary: parse_url() fails to parse path to an image in xlsx
